metadata.title: CVE-2018-20752 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Recon-ng before 4.9.5. Lack of validation in themodules/reporting/csv.py file allows CSV injection. More specifically, whena Twitter user possesses an Excel macro for a username, it will not beproperly sanitized when exported to a CSV file. This can result in remotecode execution for the attacker.

criterions.comment: recon-ng package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
